Package com.jrefinery.chart.tooltips

Classes for adding tooltips to charts.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CategoryToolTipGenerator Interface for a tooltip generator for plots that use data from a CategoryDataset.
PieToolTipGenerator Interface for a tooltip generator for plots that use data from a PieDataset.
ToolTipGenerator Base interface for a tooltip generator.
ToolTipsCollection Defines the methods that a tooltip manager should implement.
XYToolTipGenerator Interface for a tooltip generator for plots that use data from an XYDataset.
 

Class Summary
HighLowToolTipGenerator A standard tooltip generator for plots that use data from a HighLowDataset.
StandardCategoryToolTipGenerator A standard tooltip generator for plots that use data from a CategoryDataset.
StandardPieToolTipGenerator A standard tooltip generator for plots that use data from a PieDataset.
StandardToolTipsCollection Standard implementation of the ToolTipManager interface.
StandardXYToolTipGenerator A standard tooltip generator for plots that use data from an XYDataset.
SymbolicXYToolTipGenerator A standard tooltip generator for plots that use data from an XYDataset.
TimeSeriesToolTipGenerator A standard tooltip generator for plots that use data from an XYDataset.
ToolTip Simple representation of a tooltip.
 

Package com.jrefinery.chart.tooltips Description

Classes for adding tooltips to charts.
